title: Premium Intel gaming PC Guide: The best parts for a high-end Intel-based build
content:
Intel’s new 12th-gen Alder Lake CPUs are here and they offer a huge performance improvement over anything we’ve seen from Intel in the last couple of years. In fact, the new Alder Lake chips are also more powerful than a lot of AMD processors, making the competition more interesting than ever. In this article, we’re

The post Premium Intel gaming PC Guide: The best parts for a high-end Intel-based build appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this PC build guide, we're going to take a look at some of the best PC parts you can buy for a premium Intel gaming PC build.
